Retrieve Usage Record

GET /v1/usage-records/{id}

Retrieves the usage record with the given ID. Returns the usage record object if a valid identifier was provided.

Note: Usage records are updated every 15 minutes and reflect metered billing data.

Path Parameters

NameTypeDescription
idstringThe unique identifier of the usage record.

Response

Returns a usage record object on success. Returns an error if the record ID is invalid.

Request

curl https://api.example.com/v1/usage-records/ur_abc123 \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer {token}" \
  -H "Accept: application/json"

Response

{
  "id": "ur_abc123",
  "object": "usage_record",
  "quantity": 150,
  "subscription_item_id": "si_xyz789",
  "timestamp": 1704067200,
  "action": "increment"
}
